column1: '''Hobbit - The True Story''' is a parody of [[The Hobbit]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/hobbit-true.html Hobbit - The True Story] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 17 March 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=7 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 8 (retrieved 17 March 2011)</ref><ref name="Moby">[http://www.mobygames.com/game/hobbit-the-true-story Hobbit - The True Story] at Moby Games (retrieved 17 March 2011)</ref><ref name="FAQ">[http://www.faqs.org/faqs/tolkien/games/ FAQs, List of computer games and MUDs with a Tolkien theme] (retrieved 17 March 2011)</ref> In this parody [[Elrond]] wants to invade [[the Shire]] and enslave the [[Hobbits]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> The game starts with [[Bilbo Baggins]], [[Thorin
column2: Thorin II Oakenshield]], who's addicted to drugs and is in search of treasures to buy more drugs,<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="Moby"/> and [[Gandalf]], who's making a spell that makes Hobbits explode.<ref name="Moby"/> It's written by [[Fredrik Ramsberg]] and [[Johan Berntsson]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="FAQ"/>
